name: GoreBucket
description:
The game is sadly not entirely finished...

I am still uploading this because the system which allows to pile up bodies is quite fun to play with^^ ! 

I also spent some time making the game look like it's a real GameBoy, LCD blur and all (This is an imaginary GB with 3 shades of grey and Red instead of the fourth shade of grey).

"C" to Jump.

"X" to Shoot.

As of now, you can jump, double jump, slide along walls and shoot in 6 directions.

The enemies will spawn forever and when killed, their corpses will pile up on the map, making for an evolving battlefield.
